page.title: 05Holiday Fashions
page.content: When tourists come to{Scarborough}they like to show off their new summer clothes, especially the ladies and young girls. In{1985}most clothes are in pastel shades like green, yellow, pink and blue. Tee shirts with rolled and gathered sleeves are very popular this year. Jackets are loose fitting with lots of pockets. Three quarter length trousers are common and{Mini skirts}are staging a revival. For the beach very brightly coloured bikinis and one piece costumes with cut away panels are the thing now and flourescent plastic sandals are worn. Light canvas shoes are very popular.{Scarborough}has several shops who will print slogans and pictures on tee shirts.This year's favourites are{WHAM}and{FRANKIE SAYS {RELAX.}However don't forget to bring your umbrella for a rainy day.
